Text: The COVID vaccine is free, easy, accessible, and will help keep you and your family safe. Get your updated vaccine by visiting https://t.co/sohfL3zr12.

Everyone 6 months and older should get the updated COVID-19 vaccine to stay healthy and protected.

Go to https://t.co/sohfL3zYQA to find a vaccine provider near you.
The COVID vaccine is free, easy, accessible, and will help keep you and your family safe during the holiday season. Get your updated vaccine by visiting https://t.co/sohfL3R1SA.

There’s still time to get your updated COVID vaccine before Christmas so you can celebrate the holidays safely.

Parents can now get their children under five years old a COVID-19 vaccine, protecting them from this virus. 

This is an enormous step forward in our fight to defeat this virus. Go to https://t.co/sohfL3zYQA for more information.

Children under five years old are now eligible to receive a COVID-19 vaccine. 

The vaccine is safe and effective and will help protect our kids and the community against this virus. Visit https://t.co/sohfL3zr12 for more information.

With free-at-home COVID-19 tests available to households across the country who sign up, you and your family will be able to test from your home. 

Visit https://t.co/Peq1SEiXEt and order yours today.

If you are unvaccinated and test positive for COVID-19, you are 17 times more likely to be hospitalized.

Get vaccinated if you haven’t already done so, and urge your family members, friends, and neighbors to get vaccinated.

Wearing a mask is an important tool to control the spread of COVID-19. 

We can all do our part to help get a hold of the Omicron variant—please stay vigilant and wear a tight-fitting mask.

Today, President Biden announced that we are in the process of purchasing an additional 500 million more tests to meet future demand. 

The American people will now have more access to convenient COVID-19 at-home tests.
Children ages 12 to 15 are now eligible to receive a COVID-19 booster shot. This is an enormous step forward in our fight to defeat this virus and protect our kids.

The COVID-19 vaccine and booster shots are our best defense in ending this pandemic. 

We need everyone to do their part. Please get vaccinated and get your booster shot.
We are working to ensure that Americans have access to free testing, including convenient COVID-19 at-home tests.
We know the path to controlling COVID-19 and limiting variants: get people vaccinated, get them boosted, and get our children over 5 vaccinated. Now is the time.

Democracy protects human rights and promotes human dignity. It’s a means to create peace and prosperity. It’s a means to solve our greatest challenges, from COVID-19 to the climate crisis. 

Democracy is our world’s best hope.
